message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTDELIVERY_XFV_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start date cannot be greater than today's date.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTDELIVERY_XFV_STARTDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: Start date must not be later than end date.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTDELIVERY_FV_CONCERNROLEID_EMPTY
message.locale: The client for whom the Assessment is being created must be selected.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTDELIVERY_FV_CONCERNROLEID_INVALID
message.locale: The Client for whom the Assessment is being created must be registered..

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTDELIVERY_FV_ASSESSMENTCONFIGURATIONID_INVALID
message.locale: The Assessment Configuration specified does not exist.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENT_DELIVERY_UNKNOWN_CASE
message.locale: This assessment must be part of an existing case..

message.name: ERR_NO_ASSESSMENT_RULES_AVAILABLE_AT_CALCULATION_DATE
message.locale: No rules were present for this Assessment for this calculation date.

message.name: ERR_NO_ASSESSMENT_RULES_AVAILABLE
message.locale: No rules set specified for this Assessment.

message.name: ERR_RULES_ASSESSMENT_FAILED
message.locale: Run Assessment operation failed with an internal error. Please contact an administrator.
